string-array.name: A_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Make the foundation of the house 10x7. Do not put blocks in the corners
2) Complete the foundation. In the corners we make pine wood poles
3) Make the floor of the 2nd floor
4) Build a porch
5) In front build a wall, leaving room for a door and windows
6) At the back add more posts
7) Build a wall
8) Build a wall on the left
9) Build a wall on the right
10) Make windows
11) Make the stairs
12) We begin to build a roof
13) Add stairs
14) Building
15) Put slabs on top. Insert glass panels into the windows
16) Begin to build another part of the roof
17) Finish
18) Make a roof over the porch, put supports
19) From the slabs make a balcony
20) Finish it
21) The house is ready

string-array.name: B_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Make the floor
2) Build 2 pillars and a doorway 3 blocks high from pine wooden planks
3) Build a wall. Leave space for the window
4) 3 more pillars and a doorway
5) 4 more pillars
6) Build a pillar
7) Put blocks of snow on top so that it is above the snow of the lower layer
8) At the corners make pillars of snow
9) Using layers of snow reach such a hole for the window
10) Make the floor of the second floor
11) Build pillars and a doorway
12) More pillars and doorway
13) On the side build a pillar
14) Make a frame of snow blocks
16) Make the floor of the third floor
17) Make pillars and a doorway
19) From the snow blocks make the roof
20) Make a glass railings
21) Build a staircase
22) Make a path and a pool with a depth of 3 blocks. Lapis lazuli blocks bottom
23) Finish the windows
24) Inside
25) Build a staircase

string-array.name: C_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Build a pillar of wood with a height of 8 blocks
2) Begin to make a house
3) From the upside down stairs make a balcony. Make a railing of 4 fences
4) Add more boards from above. Upside down stairs in the center
5) Begin to make a roof
6) Finish it by adding a few upside down stairs
7) Make branches from blocks of wood, put the ladder
8) Inside also make branches
9) Make foliage
18) Add the vines
19) …and then again
20) Make a swing
21) The house is ready

string-array.name: D_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Build poles of oak wood 4 blocks high
2) Connect them on top
3) Make doorways and windows
4) Build walls from other sides
5) From the steps and two stone bricks begin to make a roof
6) Build on the one side
7) …and on the other. Over the opposite wall we build the same
8) Connect them by moving the top 1 block further from the wall
9) It turns out like this
10) Finish the roof from pine planks and pine stairs. Lay half blocks on top of the roof
14) From the gates make the balcony railing
15) Put the door, insert the glass panels into the windows. Place the steps of the cobblestone. Make shutters out of trapdoors
16) Decorate a little room inside
17) Make a staircase and a ceiling of slabs
18) The house is ready

string-array.name: E_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Make a circle of stairs, as shown in the picture
2) Put slabs above the steps. On each side put another 5 slabs
7) It should look like above
8) Add slabs at the edges
9) Add 24 stairs
14) Add 20 stairs
17) Pour a bucket of water onto the top
18) Pour water below
19) Make another stream of water
20) Decorate with water lilies
21) The fountain is ready

string-array.name: F_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Dig a 3x3 hole and pour water into it
2) Begin to build a well
3) Add steps and cobblestone wall
5) Begin to build a roof of stairs. Also use upside down stairs
6) Finish the roof
9) Make a handle
10) Put a boiler filled with water. On the edges put fences
11) The well is ready

string-array.name: G_instruction
string-array.item: 1) From the cobblestone build the floor and foundation of the future home
2) Build walls
3) Build pillars
5) Do the same thing from behind
7) On top put blocks of oak wood
9) Door and glass
10) Make a canopy of slabs and upside down stairs
11) Around the perimeter
12) Make columns (4 blocks at the edges, 3 blocks at the edges) and connect them from above
13) Left
14) At the back do the same as paragraph 12. In the end, it should turn out
15) Make a canopy of slabs and upside down stairs. Over the opposite wall also make the same canopy, the same length
16) Build walls, leaving space for windows
17) Build a wall. From the stairs make a window
20) Begin to make a roof of stairs and upside down stairs
21) Build a staircase
23) Make the floor
24) The floor of the attic. Do not forget about the stairs
25) Make the roof of the extension
26) Finish the roof
27) Decorate the house inside
28) On the ground floor make such a stove
30) Make a chimney
31) Make window sills. Put flower pots on them
32) The house is ready

string-array.name: H_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Make a sandstone circle
2) On top put slabs of sandstone
3) Dig a hole in the center and fill it with sandstone
4) Remove all blocks of grass inside. Place a few stairs
5) Build a pillar with a height of 7 blocks
6) Build from upside down stairs and slabs
7) 4 more stairs
8) Remove blocks of the dirt. Instead, make a bottom of sandstone blocks
9) Fill with water
10) Pour water on top of the fountain, the fountain is ready

string-array.name: I_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Prepare
2) Put the minecart on the rails and push. Remove excess
3) Using a piston, push the stair into the minecart
4) Get such a chair
5) Make chair handles from the signs

string-array.name: L_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Put the souls sand
2) Prepare everything for the creation of the chair
3) Remove the block under the minecart
4) Using a piston, push the stair into the minecart
5) Make a table
6) Put the pressure plate. Attach a sign to it
7) Hang a picture on the sign
8) Decorate the table. All is ready!

string-array.name: O_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Make a circle
2) Build a few more layers
3) Build a cylinder of smaller diameter from white stained clay
4) So it should look on top
5) Build a cylinder of red clay with a height of 5 blocks
6) Continue to build
7) …alternating colors
8) At the corners place blocks of red clay
9) Continue to build up
10) Top view
11) Make the platform
12) Build a circle with white clay pillars
13) Make a circle on top
14) Above build a roof of red clay
15) …more
16) …more
17) … and more
18) Place blocks of glass
19) Make the railing from the fence
20) Inside make a lamp from a glowstone
21) Put the door
22) Also make a door below
23) The lighthouse is ready

string-array.name: P_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Determine places for future columns
2) Build columns 4 blocks high
3) Build a wall from the front of the house
4) Build a wall in the back of the house
5) Build walls on the sides of the house
6) Add additional decorative elements around the window…
7) …And around the door
8) Add decorative elements from the end of the house. On the opposite side, do the same
9) Add decorative elements to the back
10) Build on top of oak wood
11) On each column place upside-down cobblestone stairs
12) On them build columns 4 blocks high
13) Build a wall of the second floor from the front of the house. On the opposite side, do the same
14) Add decorative elements. On the opposite side, do the same
15) Build the walls of the second floor on the sides of the house. On the opposite side, do the same
16) Add decorative elements. On the opposite side, do the same
17) It should turn out like this
18) At a distance from the post place cobblestone stairs…
19) …And, using only cobblestone stairs, build part of the roof. On the opposite side, do the same
20) Connect these two parts using cobblestone slabs
21) From the front side make the border of the roof of 4 cobblestone stairs and several cobblestone slabs. On the opposite side, do the same
22) Increase the height of the column by 1 block, place spruce boards and several boards. On the opposite side, do the same
23) Build the bottom of the roof
24) Finish the roof. On the opposite side, do the same
25) On the sides of the house under the roof close all the holes
26) On the top of the roof place the stairs
27) Inside, make the floor of the first and second floors, connect the floors with a ladder
28) Add oak trapdoors, flowers and the house is ready!

string-array.name: Q_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Mark the corners of the future home
2) Build walls
3) At the top and bottom of the window on the side of the entrance place the brick stairs
4) On the facade of the building make a window 2X5 blocks
5) Also make windows on the side. Do not forget about the brick stairs above the window and under it
6) From the quartz stairs begin to make a roof
7) Similarly, on the other side. Make a hole for the window
8) Finish the roof. The topmost layer of the roof is made of quartz slabs
9) Insert the glass into the window, place the door, build the garage door with a button
10) Finish the front windows
11) …and side
12) Make paths, bushes

string-array.name: Z_instruction
string-array.item: 1) Build the base of the house as shown in the picture. Height - 2 blocks
2) Begin to build the walls of the house
3) On the reverse side build the exact same doorway
4) Make a layer of birch planks
5) Make 2 windows (left and right of the doorway)
6) On the right side of the house also make 2 windows
7) Rear 2 windows
8) Do not do windows on the left side of the house. Here we have a solid wall
9) Completely finish the walls using birch planks
10) Build the base of the veranda from blocks of quartz
11) Build poles with a height of 5 blocks and a staircase
12) On the reverse side build a similar veranda with a staircase, poles (height 4 blocks) and a fence
13) Connect the pillars to each other
14) On the front side of the house also connect the pillars with stained clay and put stairs on them. Do not forget to make a window sill from slabs and a fence!
15) Begin to make the windows of the second floor
16) Make a layer of quartz blocks
17) Make the base for the window of quartz blocks
18) Make the second window
19) On the right do so
20) And on the left like this
21) In front we make a canopy of stairs…
22) The stairs from which pass along the entire right and back of the house…
23) And end like this
24) Finish the canopy using quartz slabs
25) At the back, also using slabs, finish the roof over the veranda
26) Fix a little roof of the rear veranda on the left side of the house
27) Decorate the roof on the left…
28) And on the right
29) Build a roof at the back…
30) …And the front
31) Close the remaining holes with oak planks so…
32) …And so
33) Install the doors
34) Decorate the house with foliage around the perimeter
35) Make ceilings on the verandas and canopy
36) The house is ready
